sentences.sContent: Some children with dyslexia might only have one of these symptoms.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some children with dyslexia might only have one of these symptoms.
sentences.sCn: 有的诵读困难者可能只表现出其中的一种症状。

sentences.sContent: This is mainly because the child has an exceptional way of hiding the dyslexia.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is mainly because the child has an exceptional way of hiding the dyslexia.
sentences.sCn: 这主要是因为孩子有一种独特的方式，会将诵读困难隐藏起来。

sentences.sContent: However, we should not blame those who cannot speak well because of a physical defect such as a natural lisp, stutter or dyslexia.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, we should not blame those who cannot speak well because of a physical defect such as a natural lisp, stutter or dyslexia.
sentences.sCn: 不过，因身体缺陷如天生口齿不清、结巴、诵读困难等而不能讲好英语者，我们不应当责怪。
